CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The d-spacings of the diffraction from ( 100 ) are 14.8 and 14.9 Å for PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) and PDTP - DTDPP(EH) , respectively.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) |
| PDTP - DTDPP(EH) |

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The d-spacings of the diffraction from ( 100 ) are 14.8 and 14.9 Å for PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) and PDTP - DTDPP(EH) , respectively.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| d-spacings of the diffraction from (100) |
| for PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) |
| for PDTP - DTDPP(EH) |
| of PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) and PDTP - DTDPP(EH) |
| respectively |
| of d-spacings for PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) and PDTP - DTDPP(EH) |
| of the d-spacings for PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) and PDTP - DTDPP(EH) |
| of the d-spacings from PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) and PDTP - DTDPP(EH) |
| of the diffraction from (100) for PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) and PDTP - DTDPP(EH) |

The above entities are valid based on the context of the paragraph. However, some of them might be redundant as they represent the same information with different wordings. The most precise and complete entity would be "d-spacings of the diffraction from (100) for PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) and PDTP - DTDPP(EH) respectively".

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| d-spacings of the diffraction from (100) for PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) |
| d-spacings of the diffraction from (100) for PDTP - DTDPP(EH) |
| respectively |

The entities "for PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) and PDTP - DTDPP(EH)" can be removed as they are redundant with the previous entities and do not clearly refer to material properties.
